data: minaret | Pyramids of Ghizeh | Sakkara | wells of Helouan | Mokattam Hills | tombs of the Caliphs | Khedive’s palace | Abbasiyeh
minaret | Pyramids of Ghizeh | Sakkara | wells of Helouan | Mokattam Hills | tombs of the Caliphs | Khedive’s palace at Abbasiyeh
Looking from the minaret the Two could see, far off, the Pyramids of Ghizeh and Sakkara, the wells of Helouan, the Mokattam Hills, the tombs of the Caliphs, the Khedive’s palace at distant Abbasiyeh.
Donovan Pasha, and Some People of Egypt — Volume 4
